channel.title: My complete problem - with pictures
channel.description:
first off, i want to get a server running. ive got a 508 source, and when i run the client. i type 127.0.0.1, loads fine. but if i type anything else, it doesnt :(
sorry about keep posting this, you can delete my others, just i guess on the other ones they didn't really make sense, but this post has almost all the pictures.
[b]if their is something not here what you think i might not have done. then put it forward, and i will post a picture or tell you what i have got for that.[/b]
THANKS FOR THE HELP :D [u]information[/u] i cannot get a static external ip, but hopefully if you guys help i can get it running on a dynamic external ip. (i think)
i would really appreciate the help here, (5 pictures below on what i have done)
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/6545/no1picturess9.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img232.imageshack.us/img232/6435/no4picturehn5.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/2083/no2picturezq0.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/6401/no3pictureua8.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img232.imageshack.us/img232/8168/no5picturezg1.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.description:
@njr99 wrote:

well you shouldnt be able to log in with your server ip. just keep the ip blank or enetr 127.0.0.1
